attributes.title: Choo Choo Charles Rap - "Honk if You're Hungry"
attributes.caption: This is the exact sort of indie horror game we love making songs about! Enjoy our Choo Choo Charles Rap!!!
attributes.description: This is the exact sort of indie horror game we love making songs about! Enjoy our Choo Choo Charles Rap!!!
attributes.display_title: Choo Choo Charles Rap - "Honk if You're Hungry"

attributes.title: Little Nightmares Song - "Hungry For Another One"
attributes.caption: We partnered yet again with Harry101UK to create an animation for one of our all-time favorite tracks, "Hungry For Another One".
attributes.description: We partnered yet again with Harry101UK to create an animation for one of our all-time favorite tracks, "Hungry For Another One".
attributes.display_title: Little Nightmares Song - "Hungry For Another One"

attributes.title: Alphabet Lore Song - "War of the Worlds"
attributes.caption: This is our take on an Alphabet Lore Song. Hope you enjoy this eclectic journey of a song! Big thanks to Harry101UK for animating this one!
attributes.description: This is our take on an Alphabet Lore Song. Hope you enjoy this eclectic journey of a song! Big thanks to Harry101UK for animating this one!
attributes.display_title: Alphabet Lore Song - "War of the Worlds"

attributes.title: Star Citizen Rap - "Beginner"
attributes.caption: Star Citizen is our latest gaming obsession. It's still underway, but there's an amazing game here and the possibilities are endless. However, it's got a steep learning curve, this song highlights our love and personal experience with the game!
attributes.description: Star Citizen is our latest gaming obsession. It's still underway, but there's an amazing game here and the possibilities are endless. However, it's got a steep learning curve, this song highlights our love and personal experience with the game!
attributes.display_title: Star Citizen Rap - "Beginner"

attributes.title: Atomic Heart Rap
attributes.caption: You know the games we love. And well, Atomic Heart is a dope premise that reminds us of some of our favorite games with a fresh take and wild setting!
attributes.description: You know the games we love. And well, Atomic Heart is a dope premise that reminds us of some of our favorite games with a fresh take and wild setting!
attributes.display_title: Atomic Heart Rap

attributes.title: "Without a Guardian" - Destiny 2 Lightfall Rap
attributes.caption: Destiny 2 and synthwave-styled music? Oh yeah. Sign us up.
attributes.description: Destiny 2 and synthwave-styled music? Oh yeah. Sign us up.
attributes.display_title: "Without a Guardian" - Destiny 2 Lightfall Rap

attributes.title: "Edge of the Knife" - Resident Evil 4 Remake Rap
attributes.caption: Here's our tribute to the action-packed world of Resident Evil 4 Remake. Join us as we step into Leon Kennedy's shoes and take on the dangerous Los Illuminados cult.
attributes.description: Here's our tribute to the action-packed world of Resident Evil 4 Remake. Join us as we step into Leon Kennedy's shoes and take on the dangerous Los Illuminados cult.
attributes.display_title: "Edge of the Knife" - Resident Evil 4 Remake Rap

attributes.title: "Non Believer" - Mighty DOOM Song
attributes.caption: Another DOOM game? There's no way we're letting an opportunity pass up to make a song about it. Enjoy our Mighty DOOM Rap Song.
attributes.description: Another DOOM game? There's no way we're letting an opportunity pass up to make a song about it. Enjoy our Mighty DOOM Rap Song.
attributes.display_title: "Non Believer" - Mighty DOOM Song

attributes.title: "Dead Inside" - Dead Island 2 Song
attributes.caption: Do you recall this game? Dead Island 2 was always on our radar, and we had plans to create a song for it if it was ever released. Well...the day has come and so here's our Dead Island 2 Song!
attributes.description: Do you recall this game? Dead Island 2 was always on our radar, and we had plans to create a song for it if it was ever released. Well...the day has come and so here's our Dead Island 2 Song!
attributes.display_title: "Dead Inside" - Dead Island 2 Song

attributes.title: "More Than a Fighter" - Star Wars Jedi Survivor Rap
attributes.caption: Enjoy our Star Wars Jedi Survivor Rap! Oh, and happy Star Wars weekend!
attributes.description: Enjoy our Star Wars Jedi Survivor Rap! Oh, and happy Star Wars weekend!
attributes.display_title: "More Than a Fighter" - Star Wars Jedi Survivor Rap

attributes.title: "Song for Daisy" - DOOM Rap (Live Action)
attributes.caption: We decided to turn one of our most beloved game series into a live-action music video! Enjoy our Song for Daisy live-action music video!!!
attributes.description: We decided to turn one of our most beloved game series into a live-action music video! Enjoy our Song for Daisy live-action music video!!!
attributes.display_title: "Song for Daisy" - DOOM Rap (Live Action)

attributes.title: "Link in the Chain" - Zelda Tears of the Kingdom Rap
attributes.caption: We hope you enjoy our Zelda Tears of the Kingdom Rap! Blast this song while you're roaming around Hyrule!!
attributes.description: We hope you enjoy our Zelda Tears of the Kingdom Rap! Blast this song while you're roaming around Hyrule!!
attributes.display_title: "Link in the Chain" - Zelda Tears of the Kingdom Rap

attributes.title: "In a Perfect World" - System Shock Rap
attributes.caption: Did you know System Shock is the spiritual predecessor to Bioshock? Well now you know, and now you know why we had to make a song for it. Enjoy!
attributes.description: Did you know System Shock is the spiritual predecessor to Bioshock? Well now you know, and now you know why we had to make a song for it. Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: "In a Perfect World" - System Shock Rap

attributes.title: Diablo IV Rap - "A Little Bit of Heaven"
attributes.caption: Enjoy our Diablo IV Rap!
attributes.description: Enjoy our Diablo IV Rap!
attributes.display_title: Diablo IV Rap - "A Little Bit of Heaven"

attributes.title: "You're the Answer" - Amanda the Adventurer Song
attributes.caption: We partnered once again with Harry101UK  to bring a new song to life! We hope you enjoy our song inspired by Amanda the Adventurer!!
attributes.description: We partnered once again with Harry101UK  to bring a new song to life! We hope you enjoy our song inspired by Amanda the Adventurer!!
attributes.display_title: "You're the Answer" - Amanda the Adventurer Song

attributes.title: "The Details in the Devil" - BENDY AND THE DARK REVIVAL RAP (Animated Version)
attributes.caption: We partnered with  @CodaAnim  to give our Bendy and the Dark Revival Rap an animation! Enjoy!!!
attributes.description: We partnered with  @CodaAnim  to give our Bendy and the Dark Revival Rap an animation! Enjoy!!!
attributes.display_title: "The Details in the Devil" - BENDY AND THE DARK REVIVAL RAP (Animated Version)

attributes.title: "Hard for a Bard" - Baldur's Gate 3 Rap
attributes.caption: We hope our music inspires you as your Bard does in your DnD Campaign. For real though, this is a Top 3 all-time game for us. Go check Baldur's Gate 3 (not sponsored).
attributes.description: We hope our music inspires you as your Bard does in your DnD Campaign. For real though, this is a Top 3 all-time game for us. Go check Baldur's Gate 3 (not sponsored).
attributes.display_title: "Hard for a Bard" - Baldur's Gate 3 Rap

attributes.title: Starfield Rap - "Who You Are in the Stars"
attributes.caption: 1000 planets!?!? That's a lot. We decided to make this Starfield Rap about the scope of the game, side quest rabbit holes, and choice paralysis. Enjoy!
attributes.description: 1000 planets!?!? That's a lot. We decided to make this Starfield Rap about the scope of the game, side quest rabbit holes, and choice paralysis. Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: Starfield Rap - "Who You Are in the Stars"

attributes.title: Barbie Song - "I'm Kenough"
attributes.caption: We really enjoyed this movie. So we made a Barbie song.
attributes.description: We really enjoyed this movie. So we made a Barbie song.
attributes.display_title: Barbie Song - "I'm Kenough"

attributes.title: Payday 3 Rap - "Money (Money Money Money)
attributes.caption: It's been a while since we had a big collab. What better way to remedy that than a Payday 3 Rap with some of our good friends! Introducing Rustage, The Stupendium and Shao Dow!
attributes.description: It's been a while since we had a big collab. What better way to remedy that than a Payday 3 Rap with some of our good friends! Introducing Rustage, The Stupendium and Shao Dow!
attributes.display_title: Payday 3 Rap - "Money (Money Money Money)

attributes.title: Undertale Song - "To The Bone" (Remastered)
attributes.caption: Another JT classic gets a much-deserved remaster! We hope you enjoy this refreshed rendition of our Undertale Song, "To The Bone"!
attributes.description: Another JT classic gets a much-deserved remaster! We hope you enjoy this refreshed rendition of our Undertale Song, "To The Bone"!
attributes.display_title: Undertale Song - "To The Bone" (Remastered)

attributes.title: FNAF Movie Song - "This is the Last Night"
attributes.caption: You knew this was coming. Enjoy our new song for the Five Nights at Freddy's Movie!
attributes.description: You knew this was coming. Enjoy our new song for the Five Nights at Freddy's Movie!
attributes.display_title: FNAF Movie Song - "This is the Last Night"

attributes.title: Mortal Kombat Rap - "Fatalities, Pt. 3"
attributes.caption: Some things just go well together. Peanut Butter and Jelly, Bacon and Eggs, Rockit Music, and JT Music. And then you throw in the age-old tradition of a "Fatalities" Mortal Kombat Rap and you got a good day.
attributes.description: Some things just go well together. Peanut Butter and Jelly, Bacon and Eggs, Rockit Music, and JT Music. And then you throw in the age-old tradition of a "Fatalities" Mortal Kombat Rap and you got a good day.
attributes.display_title: Mortal Kombat Rap - "Fatalities, Pt. 3"

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Mirage Rap - "Faith"
attributes.caption: Don't worry, we weren't gonna let an Assassin's Creed game slide by without a song. We hope you enjoy our Assassin's Creed Mirage Rap!
attributes.description: Don't worry, we weren't gonna let an Assassin's Creed game slide by without a song. We hope you enjoy our Assassin's Creed Mirage Rap!
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed Mirage Rap - "Faith"
